about_the_game:
This Commercial License give you the rights to sell the prints you produce from Hero Mini Maker, not the STL files.

This commercial license is geared towards small companies or individuals who want to include pre-printed miniatures with their game, product or just sell pre-printed miniatures. This Licence does not include the rights to sell STL files produced by Hero Mini Maker.

This Licence includes the current content in Hero Mini Maker and any content added to Hero Mini Maker in the future.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5/i7 or AMD Phenom II x4
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 4870/5770/6770 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 260/460/550 Ti
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: None
